title: How tow rite to english support team
body: Hello there i want to write to a english support team i am from the czech republic and rioters there just dont care at all i want to disguise my problem with someone smart. But even i write with US/ENG on in right corner it still goes to czech rioters any help please ?

replies.body: It's great that you'd like to talk with the NA agents so much, but if this issue is about an EU account it'll need to go through the EU support. You can reach out to them by submitting a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new)
I know but i dont care if will be talking with english people. I just dont want to talk with people from my country, its simple. Even i write the whole thing in english still czech rioters responds.
